department: Administrative Tribunal Support Services of Canada
short_summary: The Contract is for delivering  office furniture to various location of the non-profit organization.
full_summary:
### Notification of Public Procurement (NPP) for Office Furniture

#### RFP No: 2023-17560, Annex S Amendment (#9)
*   [Tender ID : cb-510-53857902](#)

#### Public Procurement Advisory (PPA) Framework
This Procurement is issued under the federal government's Public Procurement Advisory (PPA) framework for managing Supply Arrangements.

#### Notice Description - General Procurement Scenario
Administrative Tribunal Support Services of Canada requires a procurement team to deliver office furniture to various locations in Ottawa, National Capital Region (NCR), by March 31st, 2024.

#### Supply Arrangement (SA) Reference
The SAA reference for this procurement is E60PQ 140003C.

#### Geography of Delivery
Delivery shall take place in Ottawa, Ontario, and consequently, should consider the geography for shipment route.

#### Firm Fixed Price
As indicated in the original solicitation, this procurement process will be a firm fixed price tender only.

#### Form of Tender Submission
As per the instructions provided, tenders must be submitted in electronic media via purchases Canada portal when t/t applicable. Suppliers can upload their quotes electronically.

#### Deadline to Submits Tenders
Submissions of Tenders is 27 December 2023 at 2:00 p.m. local time. Late submission will be rejected without justification.

#### Evaluation Criteria
*   Supplier's firm fixed total price, in lowest-cost, secured format.

#### Trade Agreement
This procurement complies with the Industry Canada regulations for supply to indigenous suppliers.

#### Notice URL - Canada
Here is the link to the procurement documents: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26806/rfb-20231760---final.pdf
